text: Elgg is a municipality of the district Winterthur in the canton of Zurich in Switzerland. On 1 January 2018, the former municipality of Hofstetten bei Elgg merged into the municipality of Elgg. ==Gallery== File:Elgg Dorf.jpg|Elgg File:Elgg Faktrabdomo 708.jpg|Timber framing house at Elgg File:Elgg katolika preghejo 726.jpg|Catholic church of Elgg ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Website * Category:Municipalities in Winterthur Category:Cities in Switzerland
title: Elgg
